Subject: Thank You.
From: "Carnage Blood" <Carnage@...>

** Vlad could hear things going on inside of the Iorn Fist, which reminded him of a battle he was in when he had first arrived here on this strange world. Shesta whinned and paced a bit at his heels, perhaps sensing something he could not. All natural animals seemed that way.
He cleared his throat and nodded once Fenox had told him that he was accepted to stay and would show him to his quarters for the time which he would be there. Which seemed logical.** " Um...thanks." ** Shesta tilts her head while looking towards Fenox.**
